sections.title: General Affliction Rules
sections.description: Core mechanics for how all afflictions work, including save structure, onset times, frequency, effects, and cures

sections.title: Disease and Poison Progression Tracks (Optional Rules)
sections.description: Optional progression track system for diseases and poisons that create escalating conditions rather than simple ability damage

sections.title: Blinding Sickness
sections.description: Disease that causes blindness at the impaired state on the physical disease track

sections.title: Bubonic Plague
sections.description: Disease that follows the physical disease track, transmitted by injury or inhalation

sections.title: Cackle Fever
sections.description: Inhaled disease that follows the mental disease track

sections.title: Dementia Dust
sections.description: Mental disease that requires magic to cure and improve condition

sections.title: Demon Fever
sections.description: Physical disease with permanent penalties at impaired state

sections.title: Devil Chills
sections.description: Physical disease requiring three consecutive saves to cure

sections.title: Filth Fever
sections.description: Basic physical disease transmitted by injury

sections.title: Leprosy
sections.description: Special physical disease with custom track ending at stiffened state

sections.title: Mindfire
sections.description: Inhaled disease that follows the mental disease track

sections.title: Mummy Rot
sections.description: Special disease affecting both physical and mental tracks simultaneously

sections.title: Red Ache
sections.description: Physical disease that also causes strength damage

sections.title: Shakes
sections.description: Contact disease that causes dexterity damage and follows physical track

sections.title: Slimy Doom
sections.description: Contact disease with permanent penalties from impaired state onward

sections.title: Black Lotus Extract
sections.description: Deadly contact poison with shortened constitution track

sections.title: Blue Whinnis
sections.description: Injury poison with shortened constitution track ending at unconscious

sections.title: Deathblade
sections.description: Lethal injury poison following full constitution track

sections.title: Green Lotus
sections.description: Contact poison affecting charisma with pliable end state

sections.title: Id Moss
sections.description: Ingested poison that affects intelligence

sections.title: Insanity Mist
sections.description: Inhaled poison that follows the wisdom track

sections.title: Large Scorpion Venom
sections.description: Injury poison that follows the strength track

sections.title: Small Centipede Poison
sections.description: Dexterity poison requiring two failed saves to progress past sluggish

sections.title: Ungol Dust
sections.description: Inhaled charisma poison requiring magic to recover past weakened state

sections.title: Inebriation System
sections.description: Complete system for alcohol consumption with progression levels from sober to passed out, plus rules for hangovers and addiction
